Literature.Title: Isolation of anteiso-C17, iso-C17, iso-C16, and iso-C15 bacillomycin D from Bacillus amyloliquefaciens SD-32 and their antifungal activities against plant pathogens
Literature.Author: Tanaka K, Ishihara A, Nakajima H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Botryosphaeria berengeriana MAFF 645002(IC50=3.7±1.8µM),Botrytis cinerea MAFF 744071(IC50=4.2±1.4µM),Pyricularia grisea MAFF 101583(IC50=4.3±1.9µM),Didymella bryoniae MAFF 235932(MFC=4.7±2.1µM),Sclerotinia sclerotiorum NBRC 4876(IC50=4.9±2.0µM),Monilinia fructicola NBRC 30451(IC50=5.0±2.8µM),Rhizoctonia solani MAFF 305219(IC50=6.5±2.0µM),Penicillium expansum NBRC 5453(IC50=10.9±5.4µg/ml),Colletotrichum acutatum NBRC 32849(MIC=10.6±3.1µM),Fusarium oxysporum MAFF 410171(IC50=14.1±2.9µM),Fusarium graminearum ARC 2075-1(IC50=11.2±2.8µM),Alternaria alternata MAFF 731001(IC50=14.6±2.9µM),Pythium aphanidermatum MAFF 239200(IC50=>40µM),Botrytis cinerea MAFF 744071(MIC=30µM)
